page_analysis.text_content:
Parking

Parking space standards

Parking regulations af-
fect the appearance of
the streetscapes in our
residential neighbor-
hoods by minimizing
the number of cars
parked on the street
and in the front yards
by requiring that there
are parking spaces
available deeper into
the lot.

• Two spaces are required on the lot (per
dwelling).

• They may NOT be located in the
required front yard or, first 10 ft of,
required street side yard.

• 2nd dwelling units have same require-
ments.

• No underground parking garages except
by variance.

• One of the two spaces must be covered.

• To be considered detached, a covered-
parking structure must be a minimum of
3' from the main dwelling.

• Minimim size for an uncovered space is
8.5' x 18'.

• Minimum clearance inside a covered
parking structure to be 10' x 20' for
each space. Therefore, a two-car garage
or carport to be 20' x 20' clear inside.

Code sections

18.12.060, 18.83.090

• Minimum vertical clearance: 7'.

*

* Clear area for parking space must be free
of other uses e.g., water heaters, clothes
washers or dryer, bicycle parking facili-
ties, etc.

visual_elements.description: A plan view diagram illustrating parking space dimensions for both a garage (covered space) and an uncovered space. The diagram shows two parking spaces arranged in tandem. The top space, labeled 'Required covered space', shows a car parked within a rectangular area. Dimensions are indicated: '10' min inside clearance' horizontally and '20' min. inside clearance' vertically. An asterisk symbol is next to the '10' min' dimension. The bottom space, labeled '2nd space (uncovered) Tandem OK', also shows a car parked within a rectangular area. Dimensions are indicated: '8.5' min uncovered space' horizontally and '18' min. uncovered space' vertically. An asterisk symbol is next to the '20' min' dimension for the covered space.
visual_elements.location: Right side of the page, spanning from top to bottom

technical_specifications.parameter: Minimum clearance inside covered parking structure (per space)
Minimum distance for detached covered-parking structure from main dwelling

sections: Parking regulations affect the appearance of the streetscapes in our residential neighborhoods by minimizing the number of cars parked on the street and in the front yards by requiring that there are parking spaces available deeper into the lot.

additional_notes: The page number '34' is located at the bottom left.

Two asterisk symbols (*) are present in the text content, indicating specific conditions or clarifications. One is next to 'Minimum vertical clearance: 7'.' and the other introduces the 'Clear area for parking space' note.
Two asterisk symbols (*) are present in the diagram, one next to the '10' min' dimension for the covered space and another next to the '20' min' dimension for the covered space.
